text: Belle is a 2013 British biographical drama movie directed by Amma Asante and starring Gugu Mbatha-Raw, Tom Wilkinson, Miranda Richardson, Emily Watson, Alex Jennings, Penelope Wilton, Matthew Goode, James Norton. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:2013 drama movies Category:2010s biographical movies Category:British biographical movies Category:2010s British drama movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Amma Asante
title: Belle (2013 movie)
